mapper.select: SELECT t.*,s1.user_name as create_user_name,s2.user_name as update_user_name FROM sys_setting t LEFT JOIN sys_user s1 ON s1.id = t.create_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user s2 ON s2.id = t.update_user_id
SELECT count(1) FROM sys_setting t LEFT JOIN sys_user s1 ON s1.id = t.create_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user s2 ON s2.id = t.update_user_id

SELECT t.*, s1.user_name AS create_user_name, s2.user_name AS update_user_name FROM sys_setting t LEFT JOIN sys_user s1 FORCE INDEX(Index_sysuser_id_username) ON s1.id = t.create_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user s2 FORCE INDEX(Index_sysuser_id_username) ON s2.id = t.update_user_id WHERE t.delete_flag = 0 AND t.setting_code = '${settingCode}'
SELECT id,setting_code,setting_value FROM sys_setting WHERE setting_type= '${type}'
